stack writes:
> Study of the native gzip code, how its working around 
> end-of-gzip-member, and trying to figure exactly how Inflater works, or 
> doesn't, are next up on the agenda.

It may be useful to take a look at the code in libarc that does
this. Specifically the 'x_decompress_member' function and the
GZIP_ARC_File::read_arc_file() member function.

    -tree
